text: Billabong High International School, Noida is a CBSE school located on a seven-acre campus in Sector 34, Noida, India. It was founded by the G D Education Society. The school also has a kindergarten called Kangaroo Kids Noida. It also has an ERP access ==External links== * http://www.billabongnoida.com *http://school-erp.three60.in Category:International schools in India Category:Primary schools in Uttar Pradesh Category:High schools and secondary schools in Uttar Pradesh Category:Schools in Noida
title: Billabong High International School Noida
